Interface ISelectedFileService

Namespace
MdFilesMerger.App.Abstract
Assembly
MdFilesMerger.App.dll

Interface with methods for handling collection of selected file objects.

Inheritance: IService<T> -> ICRUDService<T> -> IDirectoryService<T> -> IRelativeFileService<T> -> ISelectedFileService
IService<T> -> ICRUDService<T> -> IDirectoryService<T> -> IEditFileService<T> -> ISelectedFileService
Implementations: SelectedFileService 

public interface ISelectedFileService : IRelativeFileService<ISelectedFile>, IEditFileService<ISelectedFile>, IDirectoryService<ISelectedFile>, ICRUDService<ISelectedFile>, IService<ISelectedFile>

Methods

AppendFile(ISelectedFile?, FileInfo?, string)

Appends the content of the specified file to the destination file.

void AppendFile(ISelectedFile? appendedFile, FileInfo? destinationFile, string newLine)

Parameters

appendedFile ISelectedFile

The object associated with the file to append.

destinationFile FileInfo

The destination file, to which the content of the file will be appended.

newLine string

The new line style, used in destination file.

CreateRange(IEnumerable<FileInfo>, IMainDirectory)

Creates new objects associated with specified files and main directory and adds them to the stored collection.

int CreateRange(IEnumerable<FileInfo> list, IMainDirectory mainDirectory)

Parameters

list IEnumerable<FileInfo>

The collection of files that will be associated with added objects.

mainDirectory IMainDirectory

The main directory that all created objects will be connected with.
